Name: the Illyrian Palatinate
Description: One of the oldest and smallest Periphery states, the Illyrian Palatinate was founded on the twenty-third century by settlers from Terra's Scandinavia region who were escaping the political upheaval during the break-up of the Terran Aliiance. Its isolation kept it relatively safe until the Succession Wars, which made the ruling oligarchs to hire mercenaries to protect their holdings from pirates and raiders.
ReputationStatements: You don't look that much impressive on paper. Let's see how well you perform in real combat.

MissionSuccessStatements: I am glad I was wrong in my initial feeling towards you. Consider me impressed, mercenary.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: I see you were not up to the task. At least all of it.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Disappointing that I failed to detect what should have been quite obvious about your pathetic little troupe of 'Mechs.
